title: Portugal, lack of technology and direct trade

content.prompt: Which of the following factors best explains why the Portuguese did not engage in direct trading relations with West African states until the fifteenth century?

choices.label: Lack of the necessary navigational and maritime technology
Lack of European interest in African goods
Directives from the pope to limit trade between Christians and Africans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
